mapper.select: select r.reservation_no, r.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, r.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((r.return_date-r.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time,s.status from sharing_reservation r, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no

select r.reservation_no, r.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, r.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((r.return_date-r.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time,s.status from sharing_reservation r, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and s.status=#{sharingStatus}

select r.reservation_no, r.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, r.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((r.return_date-r.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time,s.status from sharing_reservation r, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and r.member_id=#{memberVO.memberId}

select r.reservation_no, r.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, r.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((r.return_date-r.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time,s.status from sharing_reservation r, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and c.car_nick_name=#{carVO.carNickName}

select r.reservation_no, r.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, r.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((r.return_date-r.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time,s.status from sharing_reservation r, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and s.status=#{sharingStatus} and r.member_id=#{memberVO.memberId}

select r.reservation_no, r.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, r.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((r.return_date-r.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time,s.status from sharing_reservation r, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and s.status=#{sharingStatus} and c.car_nick_name=#{carVO.carNickName}

select r.reservation_no, r.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, r.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((r.return_date-r.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time,s.status from sharing_reservation r, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and c.car_nick_name=#{carVO.carNickName} and r.member_id=#{memberVO.memberId}

select r.reservation_no, r.rental_price, m.driving_fee, c.car_no, r.member_id, c.car_nick_name, c.ucar_zone_name, u.ucar_zone_address, c.car_model, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, ceil((r.return_date-r.rental_date)*24*60) as available_time,s.status from sharing_reservation r, car c, ucar_zone u, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.car_no=c.car_no and c.ucar_zone_name=u.ucar_zone_name and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and s.status=#{sharingStatus} and c.car_nick_name=#{carVO.carNickName} and r.member_id=#{memberVO.memberId}
